title: 95/71/EC: Commission Decision of 9 March 1995 approving the programme for the eradication of infectious bovine rhinotracheitis in Sweden (¹) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 9 March 1995 approving the programme for the eradication of infectious bovine rhinotracheitis in Sweden (Only the Swedish text is authentic) (Text with EEA relevance) (95/71/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the eradication of infectious bovine rhinotracheitis from Sweden is hereby approved for a period of two years.
Sweden shall bring into force by 1 March 1995 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the programme referred to in Article 1.
This Decision shall enter into force on 1 March 1995.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Sweden.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 March 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
